instruction: looking for a funny movie about weddings and friendship
output: If you want laughs and a bit of wedding chaos, you’ve got to watch Bride Wars! It’s all about two besties who accidentally book their weddings on the same day and hilarity ensues. Perfect for a fun, feel-good movie night! 💍😂👯‍♀️
